Find him!

Wow. You're pretty terrible at this whole sneaking thing.

Oh, hello.

The Mechanist's orders leave no room for mercy.
So much to do.
The Mechanist will be pleased with my progress.

I hope I find someone else to assist soon.
The Mechanist has sent me to help.
